title: Fisetin, a Promising Anti-Cancer Flavonoid: A Brief Review of Its Biological Effects and Molecular Mechanisms in Lung Cancer Prevention and Therapy.
abstract: Experimental evidence has demonstrated that compounds of natural origin possess adjuvant anti-cancer properties, and their combination with anti-cancer drugs has the potential to reduce drug resistance in cancer treatment exhibiting chemoprotective effects.
journal: Current reviews in clinical and experimental pharmacology
